title: Capture the Flag game mode!
body: I kind of want a CtF game mode because, oh my god is it fun in every other game I have ever played. I mean, I can totally imagine Darius coming out of nowhere and slicing Bard in half, trying to defend his flag then Katarina comes in and pounces on him just before Blitzcrank pulls him out of the way, Katarina gets the flag and gets a speed boost and takes it back to her base scoring a point for her team. I think this should be a 5v5 game, and that one team should get at least 10 flags before the game ends. I mean, this game would cause a ton of strategy, because it is hard enough getting to the nexus and destroying it as is, now you need to get to a flag and take it back to your base without Master Yi using his Wuju to facerape you. Anyways, I thought it was a pretty cool idea and that I would share, so feel free to add new things to it (Riot you would be the best if you made this).

You would run rather fast, like the typical movement speed is about 390-400, their movement speed might be 450-500, but they are extremely prone to stuns and slows, and as for champs who have global ults, they wouldn't be global in this game mode, once again the map would be massive with a lot of twists and turns, Bard would be especially good as a support on this map, but this would be a game where you can either play Offensive or Defensive, playing both wouldn't work. Oh, and this would require team effort, the flag carrier would probably only be able to basic attack and use passives, and they might have a bit more defense, but enemy champions will do an exceeding amount of damage.
